name: Joshua Clark
text: Getting coached by him feels like being wrapped in your favorite cozy blanket. Safe, warm, and comforting, too.

name: Bryan Shultz
text: He also helped me gain a totally different perspective on something that had been frustrating me for years. Thank goodness!

text: Getting coached by him feels like being wrapped in your favorite cozy blanket. Safe, warm, and comforting, too.

name: Lisa Davis
text: I loved working with him! He not only cared deeply about what I was going through, he got results. Working with him helped me gain more freedom

name: Chris Johnson
text: Working with him helped me gain more freedom from the patterns of fear and self-doubt that I struggled with as I pursue my calling of becoming a life coach.
